original_title: Diamonds Are a Man's Best Friend
overview: Amazing Italian movie written and directed by Vittorio Sala and starring FÃ©lix Marten, Liana Orfei and Gastone Moschin. An adventurer steals a valuable diamond known as "Mountain of Light" from the museum. A band of gangsters gets on his trail to take his loot. It's going to be a long battle.
title: Diamonds Are a Man's Best Friend
